channel.title: Blog on Gestural Tech in Music
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Gestural Tech in Music

item.title: Leon Theremin
item.description: (1920s) Instrument: Theremin Leon Theremin created an instrument in the 1920s named after him: the theremin. It’s one of the earliest electronic instruments, and it’s controlled without physical contact. Musicians move their hands near two antennas to control pitch and volume.
